Subject: [EQ-Monks] Blind as a bat


From: Andrew Beall <abeall@...>

I started a monk last weekend. After growing bored of my high lvl druid. My
one question is How do you see? I get nervous going anywhere at night. I
have Wu's fighting guantlets...but Greater lightstones are not the answer
and heat/cold stones are no rent is there anything out there that is good
to use to see. Or am I blind forever? =(
